mn133:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati tapodārāme.
mn133:1.3_0: Atha kho āyasmā samiddhi rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya yena tapodo tenupasaṅkami gattāni parisiñcituṁ.
mn133:1.4_0: Tapode gattāni parisiñcitvā paccuttaritvā ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsi gattāni pubbāpayamāno.
mn133:1.5_0: Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ tapodaṁ obhāsetvā yenāyasmā samiddhi tenupasaṅkami;
mn133:1.5_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho sā devatā āyasmantaṁ samiddhiṁ etadavoca:
mn133:2.2_0: “Na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:2.3_0: Tvaṁ panāvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañcā”ti?
mn133:2.4_0: “Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:2.5_0: Dhāresi pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gāthā”ti?
mn133:2.6_0: “Na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthāti.
mn133:2.8_0: “Ahampi kho, bhikkhu na dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthāti.
mn133:2.9_0: Uggaṇhāhi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn133:2.10_0: pariyāpuṇāhi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn133:2.11_0: dhārehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:2.12_0: Atthasaṁhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhaṅgo ca ādibrahmacariyako”ti.
mn133:3.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā samiddhi tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn133:3.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā samiddhi bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn133:3.2_0: “Idhāhaṁ, bhante, rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya yena tapodo tenupasaṅkamiṁ gattāni parisiñcituṁ.
mn133:3.3_0: Tapode gattāni parisiñcitvā paccuttaritvā ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsiṁ gattāni pubbāpayamāno.
mn133:3.4_0: Atha kho bhante, aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṁ tapodaṁ obhāsetvā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami;
mn133:3.4_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitā kho sā devatā maṁ etadavoca:
mn133:4.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhante, taṁ devataṁ etadavocaṁ:
mn133:4.2_0: ‘na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:4.3_0: Tvaṁ panāvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañcā’ti?
mn133:4.4_0: ‘Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:4.5_0: Dhāresi pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gāthā’ti?
mn133:4.6_0: ‘Na kho ahaṁ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthāti.
mn133:4.8_0: ‘Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthāti.
mn133:4.9_0: Uggaṇhāhi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn133:4.10_0: pariyāpuṇāhi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn133:4.11_0: dhārehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:4.12_0: Atthasaṁhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhaṅgo ca ādibrahmacariyako’ti.
mn133:4.15_0: Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca desetū”ti.
mn133:4.16_0: “Tena hi, bhikkhu, suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn133:4.17_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā samiddhi bhagavato paccassosi.
mn133:6.2_0: idaṁ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ pāvisi.
mn133:7.1_0: Atha kho tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, acirapakkantassa bhagavato, etadahosi:
mn133:7.2_0: “idaṁ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
mn133:7.19_0: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajeyyā”ti?
mn133:7.21_0: “ayaṁ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ;
mn133:7.22_0: pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajituṁ.
mn133:7.24_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
mn133:7.25_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
mn133:7.25_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ etadavocuṁ:
mn133:7.26_0: “idaṁ kho no, āvuso kaccāna, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
mn133:7.31_0: Tesaṁ no, āvuso kaccāna, amhākaṁ, acirapakkantassa bhagavato, etadahosi—
mn133:7.32_0: idaṁ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
mn133:8.1_0: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajeyyāti?
mn133:8.2_0: Tesaṁ no, āvuso kaccāna, amhākaṁ etadahosi:
mn133:8.3_0: ‘ayaṁ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ.
mn133:8.4_0: Pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajituṁ.
mn133:9.1_0: “Seyyathāpi, āvuso, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṁ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva mūlaṁ atikkamma khandhaṁ sākhāpalāse sāraṁ pariyesitabbaṁ maññeyya;
mn133:9.2_0: evaṁsampadamidaṁ āyasmantānaṁ satthari sammukhībhūte taṁ bhagavantaṁ atisitvā amhe etamatthaṁ paṭipucchitabbaṁ maññatha.
mn133:9.3_0: So hāvuso, bhagavā jānaṁ jānāti, passaṁ passati, cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhammassāmī tathāgato.
mn133:9.4_0: So ceva panetassa kālo ahosi yaṁ bhagavantaṁyeva etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyātha, yathā vo bhagavā byākareyya tathā naṁ dhāreyyāthā”ti.
mn133:10.1_0: “Addhāvuso kaccāna, bhagavā jānaṁ jānāti, passaṁ passati, cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhammassāmī tathāgato.
mn133:10.2_0: So ceva panetassa kālo ahosi yaṁ bhagavantaṁyeva etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyāma;
mn133:10.3_0: yathā no bhagavā byākareyya tathā naṁ dhāreyyāma.
mn133:10.4_0: Api cāyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ;
mn133:10.5_0: pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajituṁ.
mn133:11.1_0: “Tena hāvuso, suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn133:11.2_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahākaccānassa paccassosuṁ.
mn133:12.1_0: “Yaṁ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
mn133:12.6_0: Imassa kho ahaṁ, āvuso, bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmi—
mn133:13.2_0: Iti me cakkhu ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti rūpāti—
mn133:13.3_0: tattha chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṁ hoti viññāṇaṁ, chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto atītaṁ anvāgameti.
mn133:13.4_0: Iti me sotaṁ ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti saddāti …pe…
mn133:13.5_0: iti me ghānaṁ ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti gandhāti …
mn133:13.6_0: iti me jivhā ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti rasāti …
mn133:13.7_0: iti me kāyo ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti phoṭṭhabbāti …
mn133:13.8_0: iti me mano ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti dhammāti—
mn133:13.9_0: tattha chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṁ hoti viññāṇaṁ, chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto atītaṁ anvāgameti—
mn133:14.2_0: Iti me cakkhu ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti rūpāti—
mn133:14.3_0: tattha na chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṁ hoti viññāṇaṁ, na chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto atītaṁ nānvāgameti.
mn133:14.4_0: Iti me sotaṁ ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti saddāti …pe…
mn133:14.5_0: iti me ghānaṁ ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti gandhāti …
mn133:14.6_0: iti me jivhā ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti rasāti …
mn133:14.7_0: iti me kāyo ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti phoṭṭhabbāti …
mn133:14.8_0: iti me mano ahosi atītamaddhānaṁ iti dhammāti—
mn133:14.9_0: tattha na chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṁ hoti viññāṇaṁ, na chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa, na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto atītaṁ nānvāgameti—
mn133:15.2_0: Iti me cakkhu siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti rūpāti—
mn133:15.3_0: appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṁ paṇidahati, cetaso paṇidhānapaccayā tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto anāgataṁ paṭikaṅkhati.
mn133:15.4_0: Iti me sotaṁ siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti saddāti …pe…
mn133:15.5_0: iti me ghānaṁ siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti gandhāti …
mn133:15.6_0: iti me jivhā siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti rasāti …
mn133:15.7_0: iti me kāyo siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti phoṭṭhabbāti …
mn133:15.8_0: iti me mano siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti dhammāti—
mn133:15.9_0: appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṁ paṇidahati, cetaso paṇidhānapaccayā tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto anāgataṁ paṭikaṅkhati—
mn133:16.2_0: Iti me cakkhu siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti rūpāti—
mn133:16.3_0: appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṁ nappaṇidahati, cetaso appaṇidhānapaccayā na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto anāgataṁ nappaṭikaṅkhati.
mn133:16.4_0: Iti me sotaṁ siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti saddāti …pe…
mn133:16.5_0: iti me ghānaṁ siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti gandhāti …
mn133:16.6_0: iti me jivhā siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti rasāti …
mn133:16.7_0: iti me kāyo siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti phoṭṭhabbāti …
mn133:16.8_0: iti me mano siyā anāgatamaddhānaṁ iti dhammāti—
mn133:16.9_0: appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṁ nappaṇidahati, cetaso appaṇidhānapaccayā na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto anāgataṁ nappaṭikaṅkhati—
mn133:17.4_0: Tasmiñce paccuppanne chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṁ hoti viññāṇaṁ, chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu saṁhīrati.
mn133:17.7_0: yā cāvuso, jivhā ye ca rasā …
mn133:17.8_0: yo cāvuso, kāyo ye ca phoṭṭhabbā …
mn133:17.9_0: yo cāvuso, mano ye ca dhammā—
mn133:17.11_0: Tasmiñce paccuppanne chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṁ hoti viññāṇaṁ, chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu saṁhīrati—
mn133:17.12_0: evaṁ kho, āvuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu saṁhīrati.
mn133:18.1_0: Kathañca, āvuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṁhīrati?
mn133:18.4_0: Tasmiñce paccuppanne na chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṁ hoti viññāṇaṁ, na chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṁhīrati.
mn133:18.7_0: yā cāvuso, jivhā ye ca rasā …
mn133:18.8_0: yo cāvuso, kāyo ye ca phoṭṭhabbā …
mn133:18.9_0: yo cāvuso, mano ye ca dhammā—
mn133:18.11_0: Tasmiñce paccuppanne na chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṁ hoti viññāṇaṁ, na chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṁhīrati—
mn133:18.12_0: evaṁ kho, āvuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṁhīrati.
mn133:19.1_0: Yaṁ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
mn133:19.6_0: Imassa kho ahaṁ, āvuso, bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa evaṁ vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmi.
mn133:19.7_0: Ākaṅkhamānā ca pana tumhe āyasmanto bhagavantaṁyeva upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyātha,
mn133:19.8_0: yathā vo bhagavā byākaroti tathā naṁ dhāreyyāthā”ti.
mn133:20.1_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahākaccānassa bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
mn133:20.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
mn133:20.2_0: “yaṁ kho no, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
mn133:20.7_0: Tesaṁ no, bhante, amhākaṁ, acirapakkantassa bhagavato, etadahosi:
mn133:20.8_0: ‘idaṁ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṁ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṁ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ paviṭṭho:
mn133:20.25_0: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajeyyā’ti?
mn133:20.27_0: ‘ayaṁ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṁvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṁ sabrahmacārīnaṁ.
mn133:20.28_0: Pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ vibhajituṁ.
mn133:20.30_0: Atha kho mayaṁ, bhante, yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkamimha;
mn133:20.31_0: Tesaṁ no, bhante, āyasmatā mahākaccānena imehi ākārehi imehi padehi imehi byañjanehi attho vibhatto”ti.
mn133:21.2_0: Mañcepi tumhe, bhikkhave, etamatthaṁ paṭipuccheyyātha, ahampi taṁ evamevaṁ byākareyyaṁ yathā taṁ mahākaccānena byākataṁ.
mn133:21.3_0: Eso cevetassa attho. Evañca naṁ dhārethā”ti.
mn133:21.5_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
